# Facilities Maintenance and Support Services for CFB Gagetown, NB
=====================================

## Call for Proposals

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites qualified companies to submit proposals for the provision of facilities maintenance and support services to the Department of National Defence (DND) for installations located in CFB Gagetown, New Brunswick.

## Overview of Services
---------------

The Contractor will provide maintenance and support services for all buildings and their associated infrastructure within the defined property limits in a manner and to a standard that will not cause the buildings to deteriorate beyond normal wear and tear throughout the contract term. The initial contract period will be four (4) years, with the option to extend the contract for up to two (2) additional two (2) year periods, followed by a final one (1) year extension, for a possible total of nine (9) years.

## Key Dates
------------

* Contract Award Date: [To Be Determined]
* Service Commencement Date: [To Be Determined]
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 26 September 2022, 14:00 Eastern Time

## Evaluation Criteria
-------------------

Proposals will be evaluated based on the criteria outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

## Contract Value
----------------

The estimated contract value for the provision of these services is in the order of $67,500,000 over the possible total duration of the contract.

## Eligibility
------------

Companies interested in submitting a proposal must meet the eligibility criteria outlined in the RFP and have the necessary experience and qualifications to provide the required services.

## How to Submit a Proposal
------------------------

Proposals must be submitted through the MERX Electronic Bidding System by the tender closing date and time. Proponents can obtain contract award results from the DCC website.
